title: About Me
description: Driven by curiosity and a passion for innovation, I am a soon-to-be graduate with a BEng in Computer Engineering from the National University of Singapore. My professional experiences across software engineering, research, and mentoring have sharpened my ability to rapidly adapt and excel in diverse technological environments.

From developing cutting-edge XR applications for Apple Vision Pro to mentoring student teams and leading award-winning projects at hackathons, I thrive in fast-paced, evolving landscapes. Proficient in TypeScript, Java, and frameworks like React, I consistently leverage my quick learning capabilities to solve complex challenges and contribute to impactful, tech-driven solutions.

I am eager to collaborate on transformative projects that push the boundaries of technology and innovation. Let's connect and explore how we can collaborate on transformative projects in the digital realm.
